short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize anything from the internet with Brainy Capture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brainy is a blazingly fast workspace for saving, organizing and resurfacing any content you find on the internet - personally and for teams.

Whatever you discover, there’s room for it on Brainy. Links, articles, videos, images, tweets, music - you name it.

Just select a collection, hit save and we’ll organize it for you.

Your brain. Organized.
